name: Bloodstain (Mini Jam 110: Sacrifice)
description:
Controls :Z/Q/S/D or arrow key : MoveR : Retry levelN : Next level

This game was made as a participation to the Mini Jam 110.

The theme was "Sacrifice" and the limitation was "Failure is inevitable"

There isn't many (actual) level as I did not have enough time to do much game design but I had fun making this game.

Credits : Music :  Toccata and Fugue in D Minor - J.S BachEverything else : KiwiTheVth
